subject: SWAH
title: Intermediate Swahili
info: Readings of contemporary Swahili texts. Review of grammar and complex verb forms. Vocabulary, communication skills.

subject: SWAH
title: Advanced Swahili
info: Speaking, reading, writing. An emphasis on vocabulary development and refining of grammar points and cultural issues. The materials to supplement the standard textbook include literary texts, film, music, newspaper articles, radio and TV broadcasts, audio, video and computer interactive material, and government documents. This course presumes completion of intermediate level Swahili or its equivalent.

subject: SWAH
title: Beg Swahili Grad Research I
info: Comprehension, speaking, reading, writing. Meets with 1221.

subject: SWAH
title: Beg Swahili Grad Research  II
info: Comprehension, speaking, reading, writing. Continuation of skill development from 1221. Meets with 1222.

subject: SWAH
title: Inter Swahili Grad Research
info: Readings of contemporary Swahili texts. Review of grammar and complex verb forms. Vocabulary, communication skills.
